title: Improper error msg when calling Variable.cuda() in forked subprocess
body_html:
In FloatTensorBase:

RuntimeError: Cannot re-initialize CUDA in forked subprocess. To use CUDA with multiprocessing, you must use the 'spawn' start method

In Variable:
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (3) : initialization error at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_$SOMENUMBER$/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.c:55
body_text:
In FloatTensorBase:
RuntimeError: Cannot re-initialize CUDA in forked subprocess. To use CUDA with multiprocessing, you must use the 'spawn' start method
In Variable:

body:
In FloatTensorBase: 

RuntimeError: Cannot re-initialize CUDA in forked subprocess. To use CUDA with multiprocessing, you must use the 'spawn' start method

In Variable:
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (3) : initialization error at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_$SOMENUMBER$/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.c:55
